targets.expr: (cpqDaPhyDrvSize{job="$node"}) + on (cpqDaPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqDaPhyDrvLocationString) (cpqDaPhyDrvLocationString{job="$node"}) + on (cpqDaPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqDaPhyDrvModel) (cpqDaPhyDrvModel{job="$node"})  + on (cpqDaPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqDaPhyDrvSerialNum) (cpqDaPhyDrvSerialNum{job="$node"})

(cpqSasPhyDrvSize{job="$node"}) + on (cpqSasPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqSasPhyDrvLocationString) (cpqSasPhyDrvLocationString{job="$node"}) + on (cpqSasPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqSasPhyDrvModel) (cpqSasPhyDrvModel{job="$node"})  + on (cpqSasPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqSasPhyDrvSerialNumber) (cpqSasPhyDrvSerialNumber{job="$node"})

(cpqHoFwVerDisplayName{job="$node"}) + on (cpqHoFwVerIndex) group_left(cpqHoFwVerLocation) (cpqHoFwVerLocation{job="$node"}) + on (cpqHoFwVerIndex) group_left(cpqHoFwVerVersion) (cpqHoFwVerVersion{job="$node"})  + on (cpqHoFwVerIndex) group_left(cpqHoFwVerCategory) (cpqHoFwVerCategory{job="$node"})
